description:
We have been engaged by a multinational CPG and Food industry company seeking a Sr. Human Resources Business Partner in the Los Angeles area. This company is poised to grow and are looking for professionals who are excited at the prospect of helping build a leader in the space. In this position, you will strategically partner with and support the supply chain organization for this company. They offer potential for career progression and strong compensation and benefits in addition to other perks. Benefits include health/dental/vision, 401(k) with match, PTO, and more.

The ideal Sr. HRBP will bring the following experience - 

* Bachelors degree required, Masters degree would be a plus
* Mandarin language and/or Spanish language skills are a strong preference
* Experience working in a manufacturing company supporting a supply chain department
* Strategic HR focus

qualifications.preferred: Bachelors degree required, Masters degree would be a plus, Mandarin language and/or Spanish language skills are a strong preference, Experience working in a manufacturing company supporting a supply chain department, Strategic HR focus

benefits: Benefits include health/dental/vision, 401(k) with match, PTO, and more.
